evidence.claim: 10X Health Network implements FHIR standards for interoperability in health data exchange.
The company has integrated HL7 protocols within their data handling processes.
10X Health utilizes EHR systems for managing patient data and ensuring compliance with health regulations.
They maintain compliance with HIPAA regulations for protecting patient information.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence found of engagement with X12 transactions or clearinghouse services.
